I Am Michael The

I specialize in web development and design. I have a strong history of meeting tight deadlines in high pressure situations.

View My Work

I Specialize In

UI/UX layouts for websites and mobile applications.

Concepting

Brainstorming to the extreme. We will figure out what you need and when you need it. The goal is to ensure that the product in your mind becomes the product deployed to the web.

UI/UX

Pleasing to the eye and pleasing to the mind. UI/UX design based on your business and tailored to your customers.

Visual Designer

We will utilize complementing colors to ensure a pleasing display everytime someone visits the site. Are your company colors neon green and pink? We will make that work to strengthen our design.

Interaction

I am here to ensure your product is production ready. Open interactions are encouraged throughout the development process.

My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX and design projects are tailored for my client. My clients are valuable team members during the creative process.

1

Discuss The Project

We start with an initial consultation to define the scope of the project. Once the project has started you can expect weekly updates on the status of your project.

2

Brainstorming to Production

I encourage feedback starting with our very first sit down. The feedback from you, my client, and your end users will work to mold the project into something you can be proud of.

3

UI/UX Planning

Colors don't work for you? We can fix that. Font a little to small? We can fix that. I am here to ensure that there is a plan in place to wow the users and ensure maximum feedback.
